text: The Mayor of the District of Columbia is authorized to promulgate regulations to carry out the purposes of § 47-1802.01(4), this section, and § 47- 1802.03 and may amend, by regulation, the appropriate provisions of Title 16 of the District of Columbia Rules and Regulations.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-1802.2.

1973 Ed., § 47-1555.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-147, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 471802.01.

Delegation of Authority

Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 2-147, see Mayor's Order 86-134, August 19, 1986.

DC CODE § 47-1802.02

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
